per_frame_1=maxDec = .0001;
per_frame_2=q5 = .98765321;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=bassMax = bassMax + (above(bass,bassMax) * (bass-bassMax)) - (above(bassMax,bass) * (bassMax*maxDec));
per_frame_6=bassLvl = (above(bass,bassLvl) * (bass)) + (above(bassLvl,bass) * (bassLvl*q5));
per_frame_7=q1 = bassLvl/bassMax;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=midMax = midMax + (above(mid,midMax) * (mid-midMax)) - (above(midMax,mid) * (midMax*maxDec));
per_frame_10=midLvl = (above(mid,midLvl) * (mid)) + (above(midLvl,mid) * (midLvl*q5));
per_frame_11=q2 = midLvl/midMax;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=trebMax = trebMax + (above(treb,trebMax) * (treb-trebMax)) - (above(trebMax,treb) * (trebMax*maxDec));
per_frame_14=trebLvl = (above(treb,trebLvl) * (treb)) + (above(trebLvl,treb) * (trebLvl*q5));
per_frame_15=q3 = trebLvl/trebMax;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=vol = (bass+treb+mid)/3;
per_frame_18=beat = above(vol,volLvl)*volLvl/vol;
per_frame_19=volMax = volMax + (above(vol,volMax) * (vol-volMax)) - (above(volMax,vol) * (volMax*maxDec));
per_frame_20=volLvl = (above(vol,volLvl) * (vol)) + (above(volLvl,vol) * (volLvl*q5));
per_frame_21=q4 = volLvl/volMax;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=q6 = beat;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=monitor = trebMax;

per_pixel_2=zoom = zoom+((q1/10)-(q3/5))
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`
warp_3=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5);//*aspect.xy;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float3 noiseVal =.016*(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv*.3+.01*rand_frame));
warp_6=`float3 Feedback = GetBlur1(1-uv);
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv2 = .8*sin((uv1)*8);;
warp_9=`float dots = saturate(.01/length(uv2));
warp_10=`
warp_11=`float2 zz = -uv1 *texsize.xy *q26;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`if (q25 ==1) {zz *= (abs(uv1.y)/abs(uv1.x));}
warp_14=`else if (q25==2)  {zz *= (abs(uv1.y)-abs(uv1.x));}
warp_15=`
warp_16=`
warp_17=`float2 h1 = clamp(tan(zz),-20,20);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`uv.xy += h1*texsize.zw * 4;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float3 crisp1 = tex2D(sampler_main,uv) + dots;
warp_22=`float blur = GetBlur2 (uv);
warp_23=`ret = .95*crisp1+noiseVal-.02 - .06*blur;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`
warp_26=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`    float2 uv2, uv3;
comp_5=`    float ang2, c, s;
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    uv -= 0.5;
comp_8=`    uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    ang2 = 6.28*0.333;
comp_11=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_12=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_13=`    uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_14=`    uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    ang2 = 6.28*0.667;
comp_17=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_18=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_19=`    uv3.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_20=`    uv3.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_21=`
comp_22=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.5).xyz;
comp_23=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv2 + 0.5).xyz);
comp_24=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv3 + 0.5).xyz);
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    ret *= 1.3;
comp_27=`    ret *= hue_shader*4-2;
comp_28=`
comp_29=`}
